content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Emilia. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what you are willing to pay for a 25 square meter apartment in this location?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay x Euro. Can you tell me your price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Emilia. I am looking for a rental price of 1,200 Euro per month for this 25 square meter apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1,200 Euro. Can we sign the lease agreement now?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Emilia. I am glad to hear that you are willing to pay the rental price that I have proposed. Let's proceed with signing the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
